Package org.efaps.admin.ui

Each class represents a different userinterface implementation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCollection  
    AbstractCommand
    This class represents the Commands which enable the interaction with a User.
    AbstractMenu  
    AbstractUserInterfaceObject
    This Class is the Abstract Class for all UserInterfaces in eFaps.
    In this Class only a few Methods are defined which are common to all Class inside the UserInterface Package.
    Command  
    Form  
    Image  
    Menu  
    Search  
    Table  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractCommand.SortDirection
    This enum is used to define the Sortdirection of a Field.
    AbstractCommand.Target
    This enum id used to define the different Targets a Command can have.
    AbstractUserInterfaceObject.TargetMode
    This enum id used to define the different Modes a Target of a Command can have, like create, edit etc.

Package org.efaps.admin.ui Description

Each class represents a different userinterface implementation.
